metadata.description: It's May 1809. Napolean's great army is getting ready to cross the Danube on the immense floating bridge that they constructed overnight on the orders of the France's most famous military genius. On the other side of the river, Archduke Charles and his Austrian army are waiting for them, determined to get their revenge for the humiliating defeat they suffered at Austerlitz. And so the horror begins...
metadata.name: The Battle
